thread.title: Canadian Grief: Curling and Hockey Losses Are ‘Terrible, Terrible, Terrible’

author: Kim Mackrael
title: Canadian Grief: Curling and Hockey Losses Are ‘Terrible, Terrible, Terrible’
text:
TORONTO—In her more than 90 years as a Canadian, Ottawa resident Frances Cole has seen a lot, but never this: her beloved Canadian women’s curling team being ignominiously sent home from an Olympics without a medal.
“I was filled with a feeling of grief,” Cole said Thursday. She has followed Canadian women’s curling teams for decades and never doubted this year’s team would bring home a medal, as it always has. “It’s terrible, terrible, terrible what happened.”
